bwwExcerpt: Connecticut’s own Nick Fradiani brings “America” crooner Neil Diamond to stolid, sultry life in the first national tour of “A Beautiful Noise, The Neil Diamond Musical,” a jukebox musical that not only zips through dozens of Diamond hits but plumbs the depths of the sequin-bedazzled singer/songwriter’s psyche.
rejectionReasoning: openai: The review is about the first national tour of 'A Beautiful Noise, The Neil Diamond Musical,' not the current Broadway run.; kimi: The text explicitly reviews the 'first national tour' of the show, not the Broadway production. Per the scoring guidelines, reviews of touring productions are not scoreable when they are not the current Broadway run.
